title: Systems of Linear Equations: Substitution Method

vocab.definition: Set of two or more equations with the same variables
Solving systems by replacing one variable with an expression
Ordered pair that satisfies all equations in the system
System that has at least one solution

teachingNotes: Practice step-by-step substitution process. Emphasize checking solutions in both original equations.

sample.question: What is a set of equations with the same variables called?

fillintheblank.question: A system with no solution is called ________.

shortanswer.question: How do you check if (2,3) is a solution to a system?
